com.comphenix.xp.extra

Class ServiceProvider<TService extends Service>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.xp.extra.ServiceProvider<TService>
  • Type Parameters:
    TService - - the type of each service that will be registered.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelProvider, RewardProvider

    public class ServiceProvider<TService extends Service>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a string-based service registry.
    Author:
    Kristian

    • Method Detail

      • getByName

        public TService getByName(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Returns the currently registered service with this name. The name should conform to the Java ENUM convention.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - - name to search for.
        Returns:
        The currently registered service, or NULL if not found.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.lang.NullArgumentException - If serviceName is null.

      • register

        public TService register(TService service)
        Registers a service in the system.
        Parameters:
        service - - the service to register.
        Returns:
        The previously registered service with this name, or NULL otherwise.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.lang.NullArgumentException - If service is null.

      • unregister

        public TService unregister(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Unregisters a specified service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - - the name of the service to unregister.
        Returns:
        The previously registered service with this name, or NULL otherwise.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.lang.NullArgumentException - If serviceName is null.

      • containsService

        public boolean containsService(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Determines whether or not the given service has been registered.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - - name of the service to find.
        Returns:
        TRUE if it has, FALSE otherwise.

      • unregister

        public TService unregister(TService service)
        Unregisters a particular service.
        Parameters:
        service - - the service to unregister.
        Returns:
        The service that was unregistered, or NULL if this service has already been unregistered.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.lang.NullArgumentException - If service is null.

      • getDefaultName

        public java.lang.String getDefaultName()
        Retrieves the default service by name.
        Returns:
        Default service name.

      • setDefaultName

        public void setDefaultName(java.lang.String defaultName)
        Sets the default service by name.
        Parameters:
        defaultName - default service name.

      • getDefaultService

        public TService getDefaultService()
        Retrieves the default service.
        Returns:
